response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. It's truly a remarkable item with exceptional value and capabilities. Given its worth to both us and you, I propose a special introductory offer of $11,500. This price reflects our commitment to making this high-quality product accessible while ensuring we receive fair compensation for our efforts and resources invested. I believe this deal presents an excellent opportunity for both parties. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.", "product_price": 11500}
